cuts.raw: func = lambda energy_list, mage_id_list, npe_tot: True
cuts.mul: func = lambda energy_list, mage_id_list, npe_tot: len(energy_list)==1
cuts.lar: func = lambda energy_list, mage_id_list, npe_tot: npe_tot == 0
cuts.mul_lar: func = lambda energy_list, mage_id_list, npe_tot: npe_tot == 0 and len(energy_list)==1
